1811310532502668 411eda77756a51cbbd79e63baeadc212 In the current era of advancing technology and automation, it is necessary that we be updated with the practical methodologies. Thus, to promote the idea of constructive thinking and sustainable growth, ​National Institute of Technology, Jamshedpur​ is organising the Eleventh installment of its annual Techno-Management fest, Ojass’18 from March 16​th​-18​th 2018​. Ojass is the second largest fest of its kind in East India. It is a grand theatre of technological innovation and business calibre. With events ranging from filmmaking and photography to quizzes and prototype presentations, Ojass has events for everyone. Reinventing itself each year, Ojass sets new standards and hence, new challenges for everyone with every edition. With this year’s theme being centered around space, we plan to take you on “A Celestial Voyage”. So, buckle up and join us on this journey on the 16​th​ of March. NIT Jamshedpur No new notification See all Notifications
